name: The Pink Panther Passport to Peril
name_original: The Pink Panther Passport to Peril
description:
The Pink Panther Passport to Peril is an educational adventure game developed by Wanderlust Interactive. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by BMG Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play The Pink Panther Passport to Peril on PC.
